articles.description: COVID could be avoided by making just a few lifestyle swaps, including changing your mouthwash routine. These are the three mouthwash changes to protect against coronavirus in the UK. Should you consider swapping your bathroom routine?

articles.author: Helen Davidson
articles.title: China has given almost a million people experimental Covid vaccine, says company - The Guardian
articles.description: Sinopharm chairman claims there has not been a single case of infection after inoculation of officials, students and workers heading overseas
articles.content:
Almost a million people in China have taken an emergency Covid-19 vaccine that is still in its testing phase, the company that developed the vaccine has said.
Chinese authorities released the vaccin… [+3325 chars]

articles.title: Anti-lockdown protesters to campaign in Bournemouth again this weekend - Bournemouth Echo
articles.description: CAMPAIGNERS are set to take to the streets again this weekend to protest against the lockdown restrictions imposed by the government.
articles.content:

articles.author: Adam Chapman
articles.title: Do you have 'finger clubbing'? It could indicate you have lung cancer - what to look for - Express
articles.description: LUNG cancer is one of the most common and serious types of cancer, with around 47,000 people diagnosed with the condition every year in the UK. Finger clubbing is a telltale sign of lung cancer - what are the specific features to look out for?
